tossup_question: -  7)  – 	A catalyst speeds up a chemical reaction by:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Shifting the equilibrium
X) Increasing the activation energy
Y) Decreasing the reaction enthalpy
Z) Providing an alternate reaction pathway
tossup_answer: ANSWER: Z) PROVIDING AN ALTERNATE REACTION PATHWAY
bonus_question: -  7)  – 	Which of the following chlorides is least soluble?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Barium chloride
X) Cesium chloride
Y) Lead(II) chloride
Z) Nickel(II) chloride
